wikipedia_page.main: David Huw Jones (1 July 1934 – 18 October 2016) was a Welsh Anglican bishop who served as the Bishop of St. David's from 1996 to 2001.

response: *1982–1993 (res.): Huw Jones, Vicar of Brecon, Battle and Llanddew (became assistant bishop in Diocese of St Asaph; later Bishop of St David's)
*1993–1996: Huw Jones, later Bishop of St Davids
* Huw Jones (rugby union) (born 1993), Scottish rugby union player
*  Huw Jones (singer), singer-songwriter, co-founder in 1969 of the Welsh record label Sain
